title: 2015 video from France shared as ‘Deer playing at a beach in Odisha during the lockdown’
subtitle: A video shot in France in 2015 falsely shared as ‘Deer playing at a beach near Chanadrabhaga in Odisha during the lockdown’.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being widely shared on Facebook claiming that it shows a deer playing at a beach near Chandrabhaga in Odisha during the lockdown. FACTLY has found the video to be old and not related to India. Anthony Martin, a wildlife filmmaker, has posted the same video on Facebook in 2015. It was also uploaded by him on his YouTube channel in December 2019. In the comments section of the video, when a person asked about the location of the video, Anthony Martin has replied that he had shot it in France.

Did you watch our new video?
